      • recorderPositionNotificationPeriod

        public LexAudioRecorderBuilder recorderPositionNotificationPeriod​(int recorderPositionNotificationPeriod)
        Set the recorder position notification period in milliseconds. The recommended value is 100ms and is the default if this is not set. This can slow down the app if the period is too small. This will send an event to the UI Thread at the rate given.
        Parameters:
        recorderPositionNotificationPeriod - the period at which to update.
        Returns:
        updated builder.

      • audioEncoder

        public LexAudioRecorderBuilder audioEncoder​(AudioEncoder audioEncoder)
        Set the audio encoder to use for recognition. This usually won't need to be called because it will default to Opus.
        Parameters:
        audioEncoder - the audio encoder to use.
        Returns:
        updated Builder.

      • build

        public LexAudioRecorder build()
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Builds the audio recorder.
        Returns:
        a audio recorder with the given input.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if failed to build audio recorder.
